title: My Tasks
description: A task management application to help users organize and prioritize their daily activities.
fullDescription: myTasks is a simple web application for personal productivity management. It helps users organize daily tasks, store important notes, and track wishlists in one centralized platform.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experiences.
fullDescription: I developed GriazZ as a personal portfolio platform to demonstrate my technical proficiency and journey as a Computer Science student. Built using modern web technologies like Vite for optimal performance, the project features a responsive, dark-themed interface that prioritizes user experience and accessibility. I designed this repository to serve as a living showcase of my work, proving my ability to translate clean code into a functional, aesthetically pleasing application that stands out in the digital landscape.

title: DaichiNo
description: DaichiNo is a Japanese restaurant website that provides information about the menu, location, and reservations.
fullDescription: I built DaichiNo to demonstrate my proficiency in architecting complex web applications using PHP and Laravel. This project features a comprehensive restaurant management system, including secure user authentication, a cart and checkout mechanism, and an interactive booking platform for exclusive dining experiences. By integrating a PostgreSQL database with a responsive frontend built on Bulma, I created a scalable solution that prioritizes performance, clean code structure, and an intuitive user experience.

title: Kopi Hari Ini
description: Kopi Hari Ini is a coffee shop management system that helps manage orders and inventory.
fullDescription: Designed as a digital storefront for a specialty coffee brand, Kopi Hari Ini is a client-side web application crafted to enhance user engagement. The project features a fully interactive product catalog with real-time search capabilities, an integrated contact system with Google Maps, and a seamless responsive layout. By utilizing pure JavaScript for interactivity and Feather Icons for visual clarity, I created a lightweight, fast-loading platform that effectively communicates the brand's story and product value.

title: Gearnix Store
description: Gearnix Store is an e-commerce platform for selling gaming accessories.
fullDescription: I built GearNix to demonstrate mastery of core web technologies by engineering a fully functional e-commerce site using only HTML5, CSS3, and Vanilla JavaScript. This project features a custom-built state management system for the shopping cart, modal-based product details, and a dynamic search filter. By leveraging efficient DOM manipulation and modern CSS techniques alongside Bootstrap, I created a lightweight, high-performance application that prioritizes speed and code efficiency.

title: Creative CV
description: Creative CV is my online resume. It showcases my skills and experiences, in a visually appealing way.
fullDescription: Creative CV is my online resume. It showcases my skills and experiences, in a visually appealing way.

title: Digital Clock
description: Digital Clock is a very simple application that displays the current time and updates every second.
fullDescription: Digital Clock is a very simple application that displays the current time and updates every second.

title: PasarKu
description: PasarKu is a simple marketplace application that connects buyers and sellers in a local community.
fullDescription: I engineered PasarKu as a comprehensive desktop e-commerce application to demonstrate advanced Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles in Python. Built with the Tkinter GUI library, the system implements core concepts such as Inheritance, Polymorphism, and Encapsulation to create a secure and modular architecture. I designed a dual-role environment where users can seamlessly interact as Sellers managing inventory or Buyers processing transactions, proving my ability to translate complex theoretical concepts into a functional, user-friendly software solution.
